duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic and tactical pricing support to the commercial team.
Manage relationships with external market research firms.
Build and maintain various business intelligence platforms, disseminate and communicate updates to internal stakeholders.
Develop and coach extended team members, while collaborating and achieving execution of high-quality deliverables.
Steward business results both internally and externally to Motiva.
Drives innovations to tools and/or processes to achieve improved financial and strategic outcomes.
Have certain pricing approvals responsibilities and an assigned Delegation of Authority.
Exposure and interactions with individuals across Motiva and Aramco.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, Economics, or similar degree; At least 10 years of relevant working experience in a refining/manufacturing environment; Familiarity with ERP systems and basic software (e.g., Excel, Word, PowerPoint)
